quote: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it.
author: Harper Lee

quote: Shoot all the blue jays you want, if you can hit 'em, but remember it's a sin to kill a mockingbird.
author: Harper Lee

quote: Open your eyes and see what you can with them before they close forever.
book: All the Light We Cannot See
author: Anthony Doerr

quote: People in their right minds never take pride in their talents.
author: Harper Lee

quote: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
author: Jane Austen

quote: No, darling! To die it's easy... But you have to struggle for life!
author: Art Spiegelman
